title: Disabling icon gifting cause of technical issues
body:
Instead of lying you can just say "We have disable icon gifting because players create a new account to gift their high level accounts with the icon they want so that they can have that extra recall think" There cant be a technical issue on all servers at the same time till the end of the worlds Riot xD 

Please be more transparent with the community that made you 

~ http://prntscr.com/cqwc5y

replies.body: Icon gifting is currently disabled because of an issue where the gift was not working properly with hextech crafting upgrades.  It wouldn't have been fair for players to receive icons that couldn't be upgraded.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for any updates on that.  Hope that helps clears things up!
